name: Floppy Fish (cheesycoke)
description:
Here to capitalize on the success of Flappy Bird, it's Floppy Fish!

Play a game using assets based off an existing game to flop your way to nothing. Challenge and fun not included. But hey, at least it's like that thing that was popular for a while, so what have you got to lose?

Note: This is a remake of something I made a while ago when Flappy Bird was relevant and it was only for Windows.
